channel.title: Teleports!?
channel.description: O.K I used toms cache suite editor to light the two teleports up.. i tried to do the same thing with the others but they all are staying the same. Why don't the others light up? And these teleports are not using runes im making it so that they light up all the time no matter what so people know which teleports are useful.

item.title: Teleports!?
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:8, topic:552387”]make sure you’re repacking the actual archive when you replace the sprite

it’s also possible to cheaphax and use code to do this

if(rsInterface.id == #) sprite = class9_1.sprite1;[/quote]

yeah i seen something about that rsinterface class 9 code but i didn’t know how to put it in my RSinterface.java with the other codes… i’ll show what i have.

[code]}

public static void sprite1(int id, int sprite) {
	RSInterface class9 = interfaceCache[id];
	class9.sprite1 = CustomSpriteLoader(sprite, "");
}

public static RSInterface addInterface(int id) {
	RSInterface rsi = interfaceCache[id] = new RSInterface();
	rsi.id = id;
	rsi.parentID = id;
	rsi.width = 512;
	rsi.height = 334;
	return rsi;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports!?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

make sure you’re repacking the actual archive when you replace the sprite

it’s also possible to cheaphax and use code to do this

if(rsInterface.id == #) sprite = class9_1.sprite1;

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports!?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“MicroZoft, post:6, topic:552387”]Are they loaded through Sprites perhaps in the cache?

Example:
Cache/Sprites/VarrockON.png

etc.[/quote]
I doubt they are, but that is something you could do in order to override the cache issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleports!?
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:552387”][quote author=tank nation link=topic=671305.msg4489323#msg4489323 date=1436469969]

  1. There’s a sprite bug in Toms cache editor, you have to pack sprites twice to get them to work (this is something I’ve been told, not experienced)

  2. It’s possible your cache is corrupt. Which means it’s not appending changes.

Do i need to use the pink background for transparency or use the other background for the images like this one in paint is
red: 75
green: 66
blue: 58
[/quote]
I believe if you use normal transparency, you have to pack it twice. If you use pink, you pack once.
The Hex is #FF00FF, in RGB is 255, 0, 255.[/quote]

Yeah its a cache problem. i tried to repack twice didn’t work!

Read full topic

blue: 58[/quote]
I believe if you use normal transparency, you have to pack it twice. If you use pink, you pack once.
The Hex is #FF00FF, in RGB is 255, 0, 255.
